SEARCH
Package edu.bu.labs.routing

Class Maze

java.lang.Object
edu.bu.labs.routing.Maze
public class Maze extends Object
A 2d grid maze made up of a 2d-array of tiles. The grid is a fixed size, with getRows() total rows and getCols() total columns.
See Also:

  • Tile.State

    • findFirstTile

      public Tile findFirstTile(Tile.State state)
      Searches left->right, up->down, and returns the first tile with the same state as the passed state argument. Typical usage is to find a Tile.State.FINISH tile.
      Parameters:
      state - The state to look for.
      Returns:
      The found tile, or null if no such tile exists.
